column2: I know it's a Lettuce restaurant
column3: but I won't slight it for that. It is a GREAT local for a group dinner. About 6 of us went there for a bday dinner and everyone left stuffed and happy. Including the birthday girls' mom. While I think the "small plates" thing is kind of over
column4: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba has been doing it for a while and does it right. Great sangria
column5: and I think once the bill came we each owed about $25.00. Perfect.
